Appearance

Vue Colorpicker

A colorpicker component based on Vue 3

Guides
Examples

Rich Configuration

Supports color mode (solid / linear / radial ), opacity and grandient control adjustment

WYSIWYG

Supports real-time preview of color and gradient effects, what you see is what you get.

EyeDropper

You can quickly pick any color from your screen with the eyedropper. （supports Google Chrome version 95 and above）
